

Index -> layout home-page	 ->include header.html	->include calculate_relative_base.html
						->include escape-404.html
						->include theme-toggle.html

			->include search.html
			->include pagination.html
			->include get-site-tags.html
			->include tag_cloud.html	->include calculate_relative_base.html
						->include escape-404.html
			->include footer.html	->include calculate_relative_base.html
						->include escape-404.html
